title: Mathieu Guy
text:
Mathieu Guy (born January 3, 1983, in <a href="Toulouse">Toulouse</a>) is a French professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player, who currently plays for <a href="Toulouse%20Fontaines%20Club">Toulouse-Fontaines</a>.
Career.
He played on the professional level in <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> for <a href="Amiens%20SC">Amiens SC</a> and in the <a href="Championnat%20de%20France%20amateur">Championnat de France amateur</a> for <a href="SR%20Colmar">SR Colmar</a>.
